
//#define RealTrap Lucius

#ifdef _FE7_
#define NormalBallista(XX,YY) "BLST 0x34 [XX,YY]"
#define IronBallista(XX,YY) "BLST 0x35 [XX,YY]"
#define KillerBallista(XX,YY) "BLST 0x36 [XX,YY]"
#endif

#ifdef _FE8_
#define NormalBallista(XX,YY) "BLST 0x34 [XX,YY]"
#define IronBallista(XX,YY) "BLST 0x35 [XX,YY]"
#define KillerBallista(XX,YY) "BLST 0x36 [XX,YY]"
#endif
